title: Audio Algorithm Engineer
text: Developing Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) algorithms working on audio chip.

title: Research Intern
text: Design a soft robotic architecture based on HASEL soft actuators and provide a reliable mathematical modeling. HASEL exhibit highly nonlinear behavior and flexibility on account of large deformation and electromechanical coupling.

title: Research Intern
text: The main objective of this project is to collect environmental data using an Arduino embedded board, an Arduino camera module, and an IMU sensor module, and to construct a VIO system through ROS open-source projects
